objects.specification: A broad, smooth rectangular floor panel spanning the entire booth footprint, featuring a light gray matte finish with a slightly textured surface to reduce glare and provide a clean, professional appearance.

A tall, flat rectangular panel with a bright white seamless finish, smooth surface, and slight thickness forming the front enclosure of the booth with a neutral appearance suitable for mounting graphics or signage.

A tall, flat rectangular panel with a bright white seamless finish, smooth surface, and slight thickness forming the back enclosure of the booth with a neutral appearance suitable for mounting graphics or signage.

A tall, flat rectangular panel with a bright white seamless finish, smooth surface, and slight thickness forming the left enclosure of the booth with a neutral appearance suitable for mounting graphics or signage.

A tall, flat rectangular panel with a bright white seamless finish, smooth surface, and slight thickness forming the right enclosure of the booth with a neutral appearance suitable for mounting graphics or signage.

A low, raised rectangular stage platform with clean straight edges, finished in light gray to match the booth floor, providing sturdy support for the demo car and subtly elevating the vehicle above ground level.

A sleek demonstration car model with aerodynamic body lines, glossy metallic paint finish in a vibrant RGB tone, tinted windows, detailed wheels and trim, designed to stand out as the centerpiece attraction.
A modern reception desk with a bold red front panel, minimalist geometric shape, smooth surfaces, and subtle beveled edges, providing a welcoming counter for visitor inquiries.
A vertical standing banner featuring bright branding graphics, high-resolution car imagery and fair logo, printed on durable fabric with vibrant colors, mounted on a slender supporting pole.
A vertical standing banner featuring bright branding graphics, high-resolution car imagery and fair logo, printed on durable fabric with vibrant colors, mounted on a slender supporting pole.
A large wall-mounted digital display screen with slim black bezel, high-definition immersive surface, designed to showcase dynamic promotional content and automotive feature videos.
A compact standing table with a dark gray round top and sturdy black cylindrical base, minimalist modern design for casual gatherings.
A tall bar stool featuring a dark gray cushioned seat, slender black metal legs and footrest, simple contemporary aesthetic for informal seating.
A tall bar stool featuring a dark gray cushioned seat, slender black metal legs and footrest, simple contemporary aesthetic for informal seating.
A compact standing table with a dark gray round top and sturdy black cylindrical base, minimalist modern design for casual gatherings.
A tall bar stool featuring a dark gray cushioned seat, slender black metal legs and footrest, simple contemporary aesthetic for informal seating.
A tall bar stool featuring a dark gray cushioned seat, slender black metal legs and footrest, simple contemporary aesthetic for informal seating.
A compact overhead spotlight fixture with white cylindrical housing, bright white LED light source, designed to direct focused illumination onto the car platform.
A compact overhead spotlight fixture with white cylindrical housing, bright white LED light source, designed to direct focused illumination onto the car platform.
A compact overhead spotlight fixture with white cylindrical housing, bright white LED light source, designed to direct focused illumination onto the car platform.
A small potted plant with lush green foliage and natural texture, housed in a simple pot, adding a touch of organic decoration to the booth corner.
A small potted plant with lush green foliage and natural texture, housed in a simple pot, adding a touch of organic decoration to the booth corner.
